use sudo apt-get dist-upgrade and tell us what the errors is it spits out

you are still on gutsy. change your sources.list

sudo apt-get update; apt-cache policy libc6    needs to say "hardy" somewhere. if it does, then you're done and can upgrade
I see no mention of 'hardy' in any form.
cause your sources.list doesn't have them either

no. reinstalling is a windows user solution
